original_title: Leslie Sansone - Walk Away the Pounds Ultimate Collection
overview: Get fit fast with America s #1 walking system! Leslie Sansone Walk Away the Pounds Ultimate Collection gives you four complete, fat-burning, muscle-conditioning and stretching workouts all on one powerful, energizing DVD! ADDED BONUS Boost your strength training and toning results with the included Stretchie resistance band!
title: Leslie Sansone - Walk Away the Pounds Ultimate Collection
